item.title: The Most Effective and Simple Way to Implement Redux Toolkit Query in Next.js with CRUD Operations
item.description: When building modern web applications, efficiency and simplicity are crucial. Redux Toolkit Query (RTK Query) simplifies data fetching and caching, making it an excellent choice for managing server state.
